text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain r06_line r07_phr

LMNL.text: Let dainty wits cry on the sisters nine,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain r08_line r09_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain r08_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain r08_line r10_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain r08_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain r08_line r11_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain r12_line r13_phr

LMNL.text: Or Pindar's apes flaunt they in phrases fine,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain r14_line r15_phr

LMNL.text: Enam'ling with pied flowers their thoughts of gold;

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r16_quatrain r17_line r18_phr

LMNL.text: Or else let them in statelier glory shine,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r16_quatrain
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r16_quatrain r19_line r20_phr

LMNL.text: Ennobling new-found tropes with problems old;

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r16_quatrain
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r16_quatrain r21_line r22_phr

LMNL.text: Or with strange similes enrich each line,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r16_quatrain
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r16_quatrain r23_line r24_phr

LMNL.text: Of herbs or beasts with Ind or Afric hold.

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r25_sestet r26_tercet r27_s r28_line r29_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r25_sestet r26_tercet r27_s r28_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r25_sestet r26_tercet r27_s r28_line r30_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r25_sestet r26_tercet r27_s r28_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r25_sestet r26_tercet r27_s r28_line r31_phr

LMNL.text: no Muse but one I know;

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r25_sestet r26_tercet r27_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r25_sestet r26_tercet r27_s r32_line r33_phr

LMNL.text: Phrases and problems from my reach do grow,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r25_sestet r26_tercet r27_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r25_sestet r26_tercet r27_s r34_line r35_phr

LMNL.text: And strange things cost too dear for my poor sprites.

r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r25_sestet r36_tercet r37_s r38_line r39_phr
